example.name: autogen1
example.text: About 45,000 children in Los Angeles County are under court supervision
example.arg: About 45,000 children in Los Angeles County

example.name: autogen2
example.text: RU-486 is being administered in France only under strict supervision in the presence of a doctor .
example.arg: RU-486 is being administered in France in the presence of a doctor
